searchYourBook: Please Search for you desired book
onboardingTitle3: Unlock a World of Knowledge and Imagination
onboardingDescription1: Welcome to our books app! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary literary journey. Dive into a world of captivating stories, thrilling adventures, and thought-provoking narratives.
onboardingDescription2: Are you ready to discover your next favorite book? Our app is your gateway to a treasure trove of literary gems. Browse through a diverse collection of genres, from bestsellers to hidden gems, carefully curated to match your interests.
onboardingDescription3: Welcome to the world of limitless imagination and boundless knowledge!
